headline: Q3 Earnings Roundup: Leonardo DRS (NASDAQ:DRS) And The Rest Of The Defense Contractors Segment
summary: As the Q3 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the defense contractors industry, including Leonardo DRS (NASDAQ:DRS) and its peers.
